verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w festival|strong="G1859"\w* day \w of|strong="G2424"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w went|strong="G0305"\w* \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* pond, \w called|strong="G3004"\w* Probatica, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="G1447"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w named|strong="G3004"\w* Bethsaida, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w five|strong="G4002"\w* porches.

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w lay|strong="G2621"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w great|strong="G4128"\w* \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \w of|strong="G4128"\w* \w sick|strong="G0770"\w*, \w of|strong="G4128"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w of|strong="G4128"\w* \w lame|strong="G5560"\w*, \w of|strong="G4128"\w* \w withered|strong="G3584"\w*; waiting \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* moving \w of|strong="G4128"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* water.

And an angel of the Lord descended at certain times into the pond; and the water was moved. And he that went down first into the pond after the motion of the water, was made whole, of whatsoever infirmity he lay under.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*, \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w been|strong="G1510"\w* \w eight|strong="G3638"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thirty|strong="G5144"\w* \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w under|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w infirmity|strong="G0769"\w*.

\w Him|strong="G0846"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w seen|strong="G3708"\w* \w lying|strong="G2621"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knew|strong="G1097"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w now|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w long|strong="G4183"\w* \w time|strong="G5550"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: Wilt thou \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* whole?

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* infirm \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Sir|strong="G2962"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w is|strong="G3739"\w* \w troubled|strong="G5015"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w put|strong="G0906"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* pond. \w For|strong="G1519"\w* whilst \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G2192"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w*, \w another|strong="G0243"\w* goeth \w down|strong="G2597"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Arise|strong="G1453"\w*, \w take|strong="G0142"\w* \w up|strong="G1453"\w* thy bed, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w whole|strong="G1722"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w took|strong="G0142"\w* \w up|strong="G0142"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* bed, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walked|strong="G4043"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w healed|strong="G2323"\w*: \w It|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*; \w it|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w* \w for|strong="G2532"\w* thee \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w take|strong="G0142"\w* \w up|strong="G0142"\w* thy bed.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w* whole, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Take|strong="G0142"\w* \w up|strong="G0142"\w* thy bed, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*.

\w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*: \w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* thee, \w Take|strong="G0142"\w* \w up|strong="G0142"\w* thy bed, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*?

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G1161"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w healed|strong="G2390"\w*, \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* went aside \w from|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* standing \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w place|strong="G5117"\w*.

Afterwards, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* findeth \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G2413"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* saith \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Behold|strong="G2396"\w* thou art \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w whole|strong="G1722"\w*: \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w more|strong="G3371"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w worse|strong="G5501"\w* \w thing|strong="G3778"\w* \w happen|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* thee.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w way|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* whole.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w persecute|strong="G1377"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: My \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* worketh \w until|strong="G2193"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w work|strong="G2038"\w*.

Hereupon \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w sought|strong="G2212"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w kill|strong="G0615"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w break|strong="G3089"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w making|strong="G4160"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* \w equal|strong="G2470"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*, \w amen|strong="G0281"\w*, \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w thing|strong="G3778"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w but|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* seeth \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w doing|strong="G4160"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* soever \w he|strong="G2532"\w* doth, \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* doth \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w like|strong="G3668"\w* \w manner|strong="G3668"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* loveth \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* sheweth \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* doth: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w greater|strong="G3173"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w* \w than|strong="G3173"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* shew \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w wonder|strong="G2296"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* raiseth \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* giveth \w life|strong="G2227"\w*: \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* giveth \w life|strong="G2227"\w* \w to|strong="G2309"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G3739"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* doth \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* \w any|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G3762"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* \w to|strong="G1325"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*.

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* honour \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* honour \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*. \w He|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* honoureth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*, honoureth \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*, \w amen|strong="G0281"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* heareth \w my|strong="G0191"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* believeth \w him|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, hath \w life|strong="G2222"\w* everlasting; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* cometh \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w passed|strong="G3327"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*, \w amen|strong="G0281"\w* \w I|strong="G0281"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* cometh, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* hath \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w Wonder|strong="G2296"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* cometh, wherein \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w graves|strong="G3419"\w* \w shall|strong="G3778"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* Son \w of|strong="G3956"\w* \w God|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w things|strong="G0018"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w come|strong="G1607"\w* \w forth|strong="G4160"\w* unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w of|strong="G0386"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1161"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* \w evil|strong="G5337"\w*, unto \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* \w of|strong="G0386"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w any|strong="G3762"\w* \w thing|strong="G3762"\w*. \w As|strong="G2531"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w judge|strong="G2919"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w just|strong="G2531"\w*; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w own|strong="G1699"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w him|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1437"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w bear|strong="G3140"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w myself|strong="G1683"\w*, \w my|strong="G1683"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*.

\w There|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* beareth \w witness|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w witness|strong="G3140"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* witnesseth \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*.

\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* gave \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*.
